short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stripe Finder allows you to swiftly search for client, invoice, and payment details on the Stripe platform using email addresses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's hassle-free, doesn't require credentials, and uses your input to generate the search URL. 

Yes, it saves only about 10-15 seconds of your life per search. But if you make hundreds of searches per day, it will make your life a bit easier.

We don't collect your data. All your inputs are stored locally on your browser, on the URL that the extension opens.
